alert.note: Alert for Polk (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:23AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Polk County through 500 AM CDT... At 422 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stromsburg, or 19 miles north of York, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stromsburg around 430 AM CDT. Osceola around 435 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Shelby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
